title: Golkeri
overview: Sahil and Harshita, overnight end their perfect relationship of two years. But, as much as they want to move on and move away from each other, they are stuck in awkward situations put up by their parents who make persistent attempts to bring them back together. Will their parents' concern cross the line and turn into interference? Or will they triumph in explaining the children that a relationship is just like 'Golkeri' - A sweet-sour traditional Gujarati pickle. The taste only gets better with time.
